mapper.select: select mem_id id, mem_passwd password, mem_name name, mem_email email, mem_gender gender, mem_birth birthDate, mem_profile profile from member
mapper.update: update member set mem_passwd = #{password }, mem_name = #{name }, mem_email = #{email }, mem_gender = #{gender }, mem_birth = #{birthDate }, mem_profile = #{profile } where mem_id = #{id }
mapper.select: select f.fri_snum friendNo, m.mem_id friendId, m.mem_profile profile, f.fri_mem_snum friendmemNo from fri_list f, member m where f.fri_mem_snum = m.mem_snum and f.mem_snum = #{memNo } order by friendNo desc

select f.fri_snum friendNo, m.mem_id friendId, m.mem_profile profile, f.fri_mem_snum friendmemNo from fri_list f, member m where m.mem_snum = #{userNo} and f.mem_snum = #{memNo} and f.fri_mem_snum = m.mem_snum
